post.body: Yikes! Dude, fire your stylist, right?
@CoryOBrien Totally saw that coming. It doesn't have the lasting power. All it has is a unique UI which is pretty but unusable
By funky dancing in Twitter's direction of course.
That's truly awesome. Hoping I get anything nearly that cool.
Same thing here! Nicole Kidman is one of them I can't friggen stand!
As long as it's only a cold it should def be gone by then I would think.
I've had a cold this whole week. It's now downgraded to a quasi-cold, which isn't nearly as annoying.
Hey man, if you can make it work than keep it. I just think I'll look creepy as hell with a wrap around. Some look distinguished
Yeah, for some reason the wrap around-do strikes me as somewhat creepy when it's on the wrong head.
Well I do declare, these quotes are giving me a case of the vapors.
That's back when Corgan's self-importance was earned :-D
fucking iPhone spell correction
the only reason I have any idea who they are is because my fiancée watches the hills religiously
Leo Laporte is like Barry White for nerds.
Though every once in a while if I have a free moment, I'll hit up the podcast stream from my iPhone.
Not at all! I just stopped keeping up with my podcasts! Too busy these days.
I can barely contemplate what Leo is talking about half the time because his voice is just so smoooth that I fall into a stupor
With a guy like @guykawasaki (no pun intended) 90 seconds is nowhere near enough
Great interview with @scobleizer http://tinyurl.com/6e5cxa
There will still be plenty of Chrysler's as long as people don't start going crazy over them.
Tweetie is an iPhone app. So you could have both if you really wanted!
and the fact that it's the last MacWorld
Ives would be an exciting choice. No matter what they announce at MacWorld it will be undershadowed by the lack of Jobs
Story of my life for a year and a half span two years back.
It's great. The next step. Where Google and Yahoo! Answers never went.
the ken doll was fittingly one of the dolls which were completely nude. Though covered in a black ink. Supposedly a 'zombie' Ken.
@1938media Ashkanazi in the hizz-ouse.
@geovolt Probably winds up the same place all of the missing pairs of socks and house keys are.
He better not have taken it again. I'll sue this time.
It's a gorgeous drink. I'm not a drinker by any stretch, but when I do maybe once a year, it's that.
Not too much, working on Mahalo liveblog until 9 PM EST
What up, brotha?
I'm partial to Chivas Regal myself.
The King is camera shy http://tinyurl.com/2v8bmq
Haven't you seen Kazzam? Shaq is a friggen genie. Awesome!
Part giant. Part motivational speaker. All awesome. @THE_REAL_SHAQ
We can only hope he's not killing an cute defenseless bunny at that moment because, to be honest, we'd come second.
Mmm, Texas Roadhouse is scrumptious. Love their... everything pretty much. Even the bread there is nothing less than epic.
Is there anyone that still consistently uses Plurk? Not that I need recognition, but I totally called it was a passing phase.
So what's the downlow on Blago's hair? Toupee or just awkward sculpting?
Bailout This Package! http://is.gd/b5RK
1 toilet for every 6,849 people on Inauguration Day... O rly? http://www.wtop.com/?nid=780&sid=1544907
Why do I go through like 4-5 wireless mouses a year? I use them enough, but seriously? Bluetooth mouse even went bad on me.
Who is the superior Ghost Hunter? Jay or Grant? Toughy!
I don't know why I despise Julia Roberts so much, but something about her makes me cringe. Something inauthentic in those huge teeth.
I think I'll shave my head well before I have a "wrap around" thing going on.
The Queens of the Stone Ages's "Era Vulgaris" is strangely underrated considering how big their previous album was. Same awesomeness.
I have the wireless mouse blues.
Would you rather have a "wrap around" or no hair at all?
Who's a good Twitter? That's right! That's right! You are! Good, Twitter.
Sometimes I feel I've got to *wah wah* run away
!Billy Corgan wrote every song believing it was the best song ever written, and it comes through on Mellon Collie. ♫ http://blip.fm/~14r7e
Delightfully catchy. ♫ http://blip.fm/~14r2d
Really should go back where I came from. Which happens to be lala land. Goodnight!
Pretty happy I didn't eat out today. I can't really be proud of myself for that, but hey, it's an accomplishment.
RT myself, because I'm awesome "Leo Laporte is like Barry White for nerds."
Leo Laporte used to act as my lullaby. Not because he's boring, but because his voice is like the best relaxation machine money can buy.
Ha! Watching @guykawasaki and @scobleizer square off about assholes.
"How to drive your competition crazy? Focus on the customer and not the competition" Well said.
Chrysler closing down their factories for at least a month due to plummeting demand! http://www.mahalo.com/Chrysler
Yesterday it was over 60 degrees. Today it's snowing. Yeah... that's really normal for Jersey.
So have the Steve Jobs is dead rumors started yet? Did Apple pull a Kim Jong Il and hire a clone?
I sorta dig that "Oh, Mojave!" song on the Microsoft commercials.
Pretty sure the weather is giving me some internet snags unless it's just me? Fricken winter weather.
We're offering $100 for an answer to this question! http://tinyurl.com/5o2wp7
MAHALO ANSWERS What will Steve Jobs and Apple launch at MacWorld? Win $100 by answering! http://tinyurl.com/5o2wp7
Middle of December and it's over 60 degrees in Jersey. Talk about bizarre weather.
Have you signed up for Mahalo Answers yet? It launched today! Check it out here! What do you think? http://www.mahalo.com/answers/
MAHALO ANSWERS Should cigarette smoking be banned in all public places in the United States? Earn $2 by answering! http://tinyurl.com/5v4x2l
MAHALO ANSWERS: What is the best method to control anxiety and panic attacks? Earn $8 by answering! http://tinyurl.com/5uwzcu
Jamming out to Miley Cyrus and watching Amy pick through half dressed Barbies and Bratz dolls with neice.. ...Awesome.
My neice just told Amy and I that she wants to show us how to play "Larry Had a Little Lamb" on her keyboard. Larry's a weirdo.
Montell Williams really wants me to buy a commeorative Obama coin.
My wallet has decided to vanish in f***ing thin air. Damn thing has a mind of its own. Put it in same spot as always.
Bless her heart. An 80-year-old blogging grandma http://tinyurl.com/9ul2q8
The only person who came close to predicting the economic meltdown was Peter Schiff http://mahalo.com/Peter_Schiff
RT @ev Tip: When doing product research and having trouble finding actual reviews, include "I bought" in your search instead of "review"
Boom. http://is.gd/dKN4
You might have already seen it, but this CGI rendition of an asteroid impacting the Earth is amazing http://tinyurl.com/6xdm9t
Gaza Strip being bombarded by Israeli air strikes, stay up to date and get all the breaking news from http://mahalo.com
